title: Paulo Coelho, Part 2: Your Journey of Self-Discovery (From August 10, 2017)
description: The Best of Oprah's Super Soul | This Episode Was Originally Published on August 10th, 2017. Oprah’s conversation with best-selling author Paulo Coelho continues from his home in Switzerland. In Part 2, Paulo shares his unique spiritual journey and how he never lost faith in his personal dream.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
